title: [Bug]: Status-sync appears to not work anymore
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Both my and all other people's status is 'unknown'. Other people (using Windows) seem to see me as 'offline' and see each other correctly.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.14

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Start teams-for-linux
2. Check your status / other people's status
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
